abstract: Republican candidates are focusing on foreign and defense issues. Also, Mitt Romney attracts new donors as the field settles.
snippet: Republican candidates are focusing on foreign and defense issues. Also, Mitt Romney attracts new donors as the field settles.
lead_paragraph: With the economy still at the forefront, Republican candidates are focusing on foreign and defense issues. Also, a look at Mitt Romney's new donors as he takes advantage of the settled field.

headline.main: Caucus Video: Focus on Foreign Policy; Romney's New Donors
